I can't run any program in my nfs mounte: ls -la   shows that they have  x permission
make sure you have execute permissions at mount
when you mount make sure the uid alllows execute
try -o iocharset=utf8,umask=000 on the end of the mount command
you dont, use sudo <command> or gksudo <command>
ah it turned out to be a permissions problem
because /etc/securetty  was set to o+w    it didn't read it
going chmod o-w /etc/securetty    allowed to be login as root
sweet, so long as you get a goal thats awesome :D
